articles.title: Islamic State militant gets life in U.S. prison over killing of American hostages - Reuters
articles.description: A U.S. federal judge on Friday sentenced a member of an Islamic State cell known as "The Beatles" to life in prison for involvement in a hostage-taking plot that led to the killings of American journalists and aid workers in Syria.
articles.content: ALEXANDRIA, Va., Aug 19 (Reuters) - A U.S. federal judge on Friday sentenced a member of an Islamic State cell known as "The Beatles" to life in prison for involvement in a hostage-taking plot that l… [+4221 chars]

articles.title: NASA reveals where it wants the next Americans to land on the moon - The Washington Post
articles.description: The 13 regions at the moon’s South Pole are a long way from where Neil Armstrong explored.
